name: Gymtastic
description:
McKenna, the Girl of the Year® 2012, loves gymnastics and dreams of being on the competitive team. In this game, you’ll help McKenna practice her gymnastics skills so that she'll be ready to shine at tryouts. Tap the screen to jump over obstacles while collecting stars and catching bonus items. Try not to fall. If you do, you’ll lose one chance. The game is over when you are out of chances.

To learn more about American Girl or McKenna, or to play more fun games and activities, visit americangirl.com/play.
